      stage: "finished",
      status: "stub",
      timemark: t
    });
  }

  createRecord(e, r) {
    const {
      onStub: s = t,
      onRender: n = t,
      onError: o = t
    } = r,
          a = function (e, t) {
      var r = {};

      for (var s in e) Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(e, s) && t.indexOf(s) < 0 && (r[s] = e[s]);

      if (null != e && "function" == typeof Object.getOwnPropertySymbols) {
        var n = 0;

        for (s = Object.getOwnPropertySymbols(e); n < s.length; n++) t.indexOf(s[n]) < 0 && Object.prototype.propertyIsEnumerable.call(e, s[n]) && (r[s[n]] = e[s[n]]);
      }

      return r;
    }(r, ["onStub", "onRender", "onError"]);

    this.storage[e] = {
      callbacks: {
        onStub: s,
        onRender: n,
        onError: o
      },
      params: a,
      lifecycle: {
        stage: "in-progress",
        timemark: void 0
      }
    };
  }

}();</script><div id="__next" data-reactroot=""><div class="styles_root__goB3B" data-tid="ef426037"><div class="styles_root__BJH2_ styles_headerContainer__3KSNh" data-tid="1d1e4a8c"><header
